summary: When a baby boy's penis is burnt off during a circumcision, his parents turn to a noted sexologist who suggests he be raised as a girl. Ultimately, it leads to serious consequences.
cast: Dilly Barlow|David Brocklehurst|Keith Cormican|Margaret Holmes-Drewry|Menno Kuijper|John Money|Callum Pearce|Connor Pearce|David Reimer|Janet Reimer
title: Dr Money and the Boy with No Penis
